u_dev_tool_operation.u_description: Toggles the active field on selected records

sys_update_version.name: u_dev_tool_operation_2db63a7c2f758110a8ce2b5df699b6fb
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_dev_tool_operation"><u_dev_tool_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_class_name>u_dev_tool_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-18 16:48:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>2db63a7c2f758110a8ce2b5df699b6fb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Toggle Active</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Tools 2.0" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Tools 2.0">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>u_dev_tool_operation_2db63a7c2f758110a8ce2b5df699b6fb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-18 16:57:15</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_condition/><u_conditional>false</u_conditional><u_description>Toggles the active field on selected records</u_description><u_name>Toggle Active</u_name><u_script><![CDATA[var currentRecord = current; //Current GlideRecord
//Each operation input is available as a variable witin this script.
//Ex: var userName = name

//Enter Code Below
if(currentRecord.getValue('active')){
	var active = currentRecord.getValue('active') == '1';
	var newActive = !active;
	currentRecord.active = newActive;
	currentRecord.update();
	gs.info(currentRecord.getDisplayValue() + ':   ' + active + ' > ' + newActive);
}

result = currentRecord.getDisplayValue() + ':   ' + active + ' > ' + newActive;]]></u_script><u_table>sys_metadata</u_table></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>
